subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Mughal emperor ruled Rajasthan for the longest period of time?
question_hi: राजस्थान के मुगल शासक के समय के लिए सबसे लगातार राज प्रभावी शासक थे?
explanation_en: Akbar, also known as Jalaluddin Muhammad Akbar, ruled Rajasthan for the longest period of time during the Mughal era.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान के मुगले कांतर प्रभंत मुहमान अक्बर
question_en: Who was the Mughal emperor who ruled Rajasthan for a significant duration?
question_hi: राजस्थान के मुगले कांतर प्रभंत मुहमान अक्बर
explanation_en: Akbar, also known as Jalaluddin Muhammad Akbar, ruled Rajasthan for a significant duration during the Mughal era.
